module.name: User quota management
module.desc: Set file quotas on the server

text.name: filesystems
text.label: Filesystems
text.help: Specify the filesystems where you want to apply user quotas with the following format : "Device path":"Identifier string" (eg: /dev/sda1:Root)

module.text: Restart the system to active quotas
Quotas not supported on this filesystem :
Quota module is activated in the MDS interface.
You can now configure user quotas from the MDS interface : https://@HOSTNAME@/mmc/
